definition: article/commodity/product/goods/kind/grade/rank/character/disposition/nature/temperament/variety/to taste sth/to sample/to criticize/to comment/to judge/to size up/fret (on a guitar or lute)

sentences.english: A copy of our illustrated catalogue is being sent to you today, with samples of our products.
sentences.chinese: 現寄上敝公司產品目錄表與樣品。
隨函附上我們最新的商品目錄。

sentences.english: Please send me your catalogue and terms and conditions for leasing.
sentences.chinese: 請寄來貴公司的商品目錄並將租賃條件函告。

sentences.english: Coin Counting And Sorter Machine, please contact us with catalogue and price.
sentences.chinese: 求購硬幣清分機，有意者提供產品目錄，報價。

sentences.english: We enclose our new catalogue and price list.
sentences.chinese: 謹謝上新的商品目錄和價格表。

sentences.english: In compliance with your request, we are sending you, under separate cover, our latest catalogue and price list covering our export range.
sentences.chinese: 謹遵要求另函送上最新之出口商品目錄和報價單。

sentences.english: The latest quotation and catalog are attached in the attachement.
sentences.chinese: 最新的產品報價表和產品目錄見附件。

sentences.english: Numb-nuts, where's the catalog for my Fat Cat clothing line?
sentences.chinese: 白癡，我的肥貓服裝系列的產品目錄在哪裏？

sentences.english: Please send us a catalogue regarding your new products.
sentences.chinese: 請寄給我們一個關於你方新產品的商品目錄。

sentences.english: We'll enhance the promotion with catalogs or bill i erts.
sentences.chinese: 我們也將以商品目錄或傳單來促進促銷活動。

sentences.english: At any given time multiple products can exist.
sentences.chinese: 在任何時候，都可以有多個產品目錄。

sentences.english: We will provide the items free of charge immediately.
sentences.chinese: 我們會立即免費提供這些品目。

sentences.english: The catalogue will be posted if you send away for.
Please follow "Reflow Soldering Conditions" in catalogue.
sentences.chinese: 請遵守產品目錄中的迴流焊條件。

sentences.english: All the product catalog have technic parameter sheet.
sentences.chinese: 我們的產品目錄上都會有技術參數表。

definition: notes on the use of a book/guide to the reader
to test a random sample/to spot-check
